name: The Bowling Stars
description:
This great sports game will fascinate you with stunning graphics, good music and nice visual effects.
The Bowling Stars - like a other simulation sports games using realistic physics and real gravity for impressive gameplay.
***** Bowling tournaments games where you can defeat other competitors around the world and triumph on top players leaderboard;
***** One-to-One mode is an offline battle with cpu player, here you will win more in game cash for buying new balls or to entry in different tournaments games;
***** Single player style for training yourself when you aren't online or killing your free time.

Game Features
* 5 different bowling alleys
* Multiple gameplay modes
* Online tournaments games
* Player vs CPU battle
* Offline single player gameplay
* Top 100 players leaderboard
* Free cash & daily bonus system
* Different bowling balls in the shop
* Player statistics & settings

Tips:
Playing bowling it's easy, just move and swipe the ball.
To win tournaments games - use a ball with higher power.
To participate in online battle - connect with your facebook account, it does not require special permissions, so you have nothing to worry about.
Also try our other sports games and don't forget to rate us.
